# The `InsertCFGStrategy` Class Reference

## Public Member Functions

### getWeight() {#a4cb02d71e078aee1de85450e66efe3d7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint64&#95;t llvm::InsertCFGStrategy::getWeight (size&#95;t CurrentSize, size&#95;t MaxSize, uint64&#95;t CurrentWeight)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Provide a weight to bias towards choosing this strategy for a mutation.

The value of the weight is arbitrary, but a good default is &quot;the number of
distinct ways in which this strategy can mutate a unit&quot;. This can also be used to prefer strategies that shrink the overall size of the result when we start getting close to <code>MaxSize</code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/fuzzmutate/irmutator-h/#l00156">156</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/fuzzmutate/irmutator-h">IRMutator.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### connectBlocksToSink() {#abd6e929a3df7c6c37eb651371ffb4727}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void InsertCFGStrategy::connectBlocksToSink (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; Blocks, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; Sink, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/randomirbuilder">RandomIRBuilder</a> &amp; IB)</>}>
The caller has to guarantee that these blocks are &quot;empty&quot;, i.e.

it doesn&#39;t even have terminator.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/fuzzmutate/irmutator-h/#l00164">164</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/fuzzmutate/irmutator-h">IRMutator.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/fuzzmutate/irmutator-cpp/#l00499">499</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/fuzzmutate/irmutator-cpp">IRMutator.cpp</a>.
